Articles.Content:
I went into the VAB on a new career save. I selected the Mk1 Pod, and then tried to drag a fuel tank. To my surprise, the tank would drag! Clicking again just caused it to be removed. I tried to exit the VAB, but it wouldn't work! So, then I clicked the load button, and that worked fine. Since I couldn't exit the VAB screen conventionally, I had no choice but to exit by using Task Manager to kill the process.

This is the list of mods I'm using (in folder order):

*Toolbar

*Active Texture Management

*AEIS Aerospace (not all of it; I got rid of the tanks and engines)

*AmericanPack

*K-Rover

*BahaSP Animation

*Better RoveMates

*HOME2

*Coherent Contracts

*Component Space Shuttle

*Custom Biomes

*DMagic

*Engine Thrust Controller

*FASA

*Firespitter (plugin only)

*HexCan Solid Fuel (don't even remember this one...)

*Home Grown Rockets

*ISS Community

*Raster Prop Monitor

*KAS

*Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

*KerbinSide

*Klockheed Martin (plugins only)

*KW Rocketry

*Lionhead Aerospace Ltd. (Probes and ESA)

*L-Tech

*Infernal Robotics

*MechJeb 2

*Kerbal Konstructs

*Mod Statistics

*MP Nazari (what?)

*Munar Wheel

*NehemiaInc

*NovaPunch 2

*Procedural Fairings

*RN Skylab

*RN US Probes

*Romfarer Lazors

*ScanSatRPM

*Science Alert

*Ship Manifest

*SovietPack

*Station Science

*Tarsier Space Tech

*Kerbal Alarm Clock

*Universal Storage

*Landertron

*MechJeb and RemoteTech for All (an old mod that I keep around so I don't have to attach the MechJeb casing to my ships; it still works!)

*Module Manager

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

EDIT: Fixed. Either it rectified itself, or a mod causing it was one of the mods I deleted (including AEIS, Kerbal Konstructs, Kerbinside, and TweakScale).

Edited December 8, 2014 by BNSF1995
